title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Digital Learning Design for Music Composition

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can creatively implement simple melodies and harmonic structures using mobile composition tools
Learners can improve the structural completeness of their compositions by 80% or more through peer feedback and instructor coaching
Learners can produce and share at least two digital composition portfolios per 4-week cycle

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
